content.html:
Will, thank you for this great Plugin.

I tried to set it up on my blog at www.agenturblog.de.
But when entering an Open ID URl, I get an error message like this:
Fatal error: Call to a member function on a non-object in
.../plugins/wpopenid/openid-registration.php on line 472

Any idea, what this might be?

Thank you very much,
Oliver
